overview:
CEO of the company, Allen “Mario” Vidal Fernandez, was born on October 10, 1992 in Miami, Florida. Started working with music companies in 2003 which in that same year created Vidal y Cano Records, a file hosting site for music which created the largest Latin podcast in 2007 called V/C Reggaeton Music (Largest library of Reggaeton music). Later on started working on web designing & social network administration in 2008. Mario’s first social network was CombatBarrio which was based on Combatiente Records of 2007. There wasn’t a purpose for the network, it was shut down on October 18, 2008. After the release of CombatBarrio, Mario had the idea of the largest Puerto Rican social network on the internet. On the month of Feburary, Mario had designs set up for the creation of Boricua Space Puerto Rican Alliance. On April 14, 2008 Boricua Space was set online & was the first Puerto Rican social network to set foot on the internet. Growing in new application provided by the development team, Boricua Space grew to become a powerfull network for the Puerto Rican community. As time pasted, Mario had a vision, a vision that will change Christianity online to a word wide Christian networking organization called PRA Enterprises.

Mario has also contributed to Iglesia Cristiana Segadores de Vida and Genesis Hoy (Genesis Ministry Today). “I am proud of my culture, my family’s branches. People see me as Puerto Rican or Cuban or Spanish, I see myself as a child of God, an ambassador of Christ, a Christian and I’m proud to be one. Though the grace of God, we as a company shall cause a movement in Christianity and establish a foundation for new generations to come. We are a nation of God, of Christ Jesus.” says Fernandez.
